about_the_game:
[Introduction to the game]

Bingo Girl is a puzzle filling game. The card used in the game is a common 5x5, that is, five lines and five columns. The number of the card corresponds to five letters B-I-N-G-O. The number of calling is randomly selected within 1-75. Players can quickly find these numbers on the card and make marks according to the calling. As long as the marked number conforms to the award rules, the BINGO pattern will win. Otherwise, it fails.

◆ Combination of simple stories and scenes
◆ Combination of multiple playing methods, including: traditional Bingo playing method+doll grasping playing method+dessert store collecting playing method+witch collecting playing method
◆ Exquisite original design
◆ The affectionate performance of the Japanese voice excellent little sister!!
detailed_description:
LATEST RELEASE


UPCOMING GAMES


About the Game

[Introduction to the game]

Bingo Girl is a puzzle filling game. The card used in the game is a common 5x5, that is, five lines and five columns. The number of the card corresponds to five letters B-I-N-G-O. The number of calling is randomly selected within 1-75. Players can quickly find these numbers on the card and make marks according to the calling. As long as the marked number conforms to the award rules, the BINGO pattern will win. Otherwise, it fails.

◆ Combination of simple stories and scenes
◆ Combination of multiple playing methods, including: traditional Bingo playing method+doll grasping playing method+dessert store collecting playing method+witch collecting playing method
◆ Exquisite original design
◆ The affectionate performance of the Japanese voice excellent little sister!!
name: Bingo girl

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX11 capabilities
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX11 capabilities

short_description: Bingo Girl is a puzzle filling game. The numbers of calling numbers are randomly selected within 1-75. Players can quickly find these numbers on the card and make marks according to the calling numbers. As long as the marked number complies with the award rules, win.
supported_languages:
English*, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
